cj0ftajpu00015svwe2oxxrsc.statement: Someone is chasing you for money

cj0ftb5m200025svwvjjzpay2.text: Do you have payments due or unpaid accounts? E.g. phone / Work and Income / Cash converters / power bills / car loan / gyms
cj0ftb5m200025svwvjjzpay2.statement: You have payments due or unpaid accounts

cj0ftbhbl00035svw8pvwwtp3.text: Have you recently had any problems with a product or item you've bought?

cj0ftbti900045svwx49kz48c.statement: You have had a problem with a service you've bought

cj0ftcc1x00055svw9ek4b2fo.text: Do you have any unpaid fines?

cj0ftgojz00075svwgjphoynt.statement: You have recently been given an eviction notice

cj0fth07c00085svw4r8de9ti.statement: Your bond has not been lodged or returned

cj0ftijcc000c5svw3wyg3l6j.statement: You have problems with your neighbours

cj0ftms6p000g5svwqsyzhyg3.statement: You'd like to discuss contact you or a family member has had with the police

cj0ftokn6000i5svw3x0xw4lw.statement: You are having problems with Work and Income

cj0ftowle000j5svwgl1b4jbf.statement: You would like to review or change your Work and Income benefits

cj0ftqu5e000l5svw04okvufr.text: The safety of yourself or your children?

cj0ftr6s6000m5svw6li1zqho.statement: You would like to discuss arrangements, plans or orders about children in your life

cj0ftrjp7000n5svwyoq6uzlw.statement: You have concerns about  CYFS (Oranga Tamariki) and your whānau

cj0ftrwl8000o5svwyb3kmt9m.statement: You want to know about your rights in any personal relationship, including divorce or separation

cj0fts7ei000p5svw5j95h9eq.statement: You have concerns about your experiences as a child, while you were in the care of adults or institutions
